import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' type Inputs = { name: string email: string street: string city: string country: string zip: number number: string date: string cvc: number } const CheckoutForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const fullName = localStorage.getItem('name_key') as string const email = localStorage.getItem('email_key') as string const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const onSubmit: (data: Inputs) => void = (data: Inputs) => { console.log('data', data) } return (

Checkout

{errors.name && errors.name.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.email && errors.email.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.street && errors.street.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.city && errors.city.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.country && errors.country.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.zip && errors.zip.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.number && errors.number.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.date && errors.date.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.cvc && errors.cvc.type === 'required' && ( )}
) } export default CheckoutForm
